00011 #include <stdlib.h>

00013 #include "mod_class.h"
00014 #include "../json_lib.h"
00015 #include "../mysql_lib.h"
00016 #include "../dict_lib.h"
00017 #include "../command.h"

00019 int mod_class(const char *mod_var, char **dst){
00020         int len;
00021         char gids[]="gid", *gid, pages[]="page", *page;
00022         char sql[200], *mod_res;
00023         char sql_format[] = "SELECT id,name FROM `category` where pid=%s limit %s,15";
00024         DICT_LINK *dict_head;
00025         
00026         json_t *json_root;
00027 
00028         len = 0;
00029         if(NULL == mod_var) return -1;
00030 
00031         json_root = Json_Root(mod_var);
00032 
00033         if(json_root == NULL) return -1;
00034 
00035         gid = Json_Find_Tree(gids, json_root);
00036         page = Json_Find_Tree(pages, json_root);
00037 
00038         snprintf(sql, 199, sql_format, gid, page);
00039         
00040         dict_head = mysql_fetch_all(sql, 0);
00041         if(NULL == dict_head) return -1;
00042         mod_res = Json_Set(dict_head);  
00043         if(NULL == mod_res) return -1;
00044 
00045         len = strlen(mod_res);
00046         if(len < 1) return -1;
00047 
00048         *dst = (char *)calloc(sizeof(char), (len+1));
00049         memcpy(*dst, mod_res, len);
00050 
00051         Json_Free_Root(json_root);
00052         dict_free(dict_head);
00053         free(mod_res);
00054         free(gid);
00055         free(page);
00056 
00057         return len;     
00058 }
